overview: Barely Legal #6 explodes with the raw power of legal-teen poontang. These girls will fuck anywhere: backyards, bathrooms, even on the job. Plus, you'll watch a bashful hippie chick discover the joy of outdoor urination and witness a tender step-family reunion. You'll have to see the rest to believe it! tagline: Tight, Juicy Teens: legal cutie pies offer sweet slices.
title: Barely Legal 6
